summary_text: Session nine of our development on Creature platform guided learning. Today we will continue to study server side and we'll move on with integration tools. We will discuss and I will show you examples of how to work with standard tools.
key_points: Session nine of our development on Creature platform guided learning.
Today we will continue to study server side and we'll move on with integration tools.
We will discuss and I will show you examples of how to work with standard tools.
